seed_pair: Me gustaría poder hablar después de que termines.
I'd like to be able to speak after you finish.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'I'd like' → 'me gustaría' (M-type: multi-word); 'to be able to speak' → 'poder hablar' (M-type: CRITICAL - splitting would create 'to be able to' + 'to speak' = 'to be able to to speak' ❌, following S0010 lesson); 'after you finish' → 'después de que termines' (M-type: subjunctive trigger with marked form). TILING: me gustaría + poder hablar + después de que termines ✅

seed_pair: No me gustaría adivinar lo que va a ocurrir mañana.
I wouldn't like to guess what's going to happen tomorrow.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'I wouldn't like' → 'no me gustaría' (M-type: negation + multi-word); 'to guess' → 'adivinar' (A-type); 'what' → 'lo que' (M-type: FD required, 'what' as relative pronoun needs both words); 'is going to happen' → 'va a ocurrir' (M-type: future construction); 'tomorrow' → 'mañana' (A-type). TILING: no me gustaría + adivinar + lo que + va a ocurrir + mañana ✅

seed_pair: Hablas español muy bien.
You speak Spanish very well.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'you speak' → 'hablas' (A-type: single conjugated verb encodes subject); 'Spanish' → 'español' (A-type); 'very well' → 'muy bien' (M-type: idiomatic pairing, commonly taught together). TILING: hablas + español + muy bien ✅

seed_pair: ¿Hablas español todo el día?
Do you speak Spanish all day?
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'do you speak' → 'hablas' (A-type: single conjugated verb, question formed by intonation); 'Spanish' → 'español' (A-type); 'all day' → 'todo el día' (M-type: idiomatic time expression). TILING: hablas + español + todo el día ✅

seed_pair: Y quiero que hables español conmigo mañana.
And I want you to speak Spanish with me tomorrow.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'and' → 'y' (A-type); 'I want' → 'quiero' (A-type: single word); 'you to speak' → 'que hables' (M-type: subjunctive trigger 'quiero que' requires 'que hables' as unit); 'Spanish' → 'español' (A-type); 'with me' → 'conmigo' (A-type: single word); 'tomorrow' → 'mañana' (A-type). TILING: y + quiero + que hables + español + conmigo + mañana ✅

seed_pair: Él quiere volver con todos los demás más tarde.
He wants to come back with everyone else later on.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'he wants' → 'él quiere' (M-type: Pragmatic FD - pronoun+verb pairing); 'to come back' → 'volver' (A-type: single word infinitive); 'with' → 'con' (A-type); 'everyone else' → 'todos los demás' (M-type: multi-word phrase); 'later on' → 'más tarde' (M-type: idiomatic time expression). TILING: él quiere + volver + con + todos los demás + más tarde ✅

seed_pair: Ella quiere descubrir cuál es la respuesta.
She wants to find out what the answer is.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'she wants' → 'ella quiere' (M-type: Pragmatic FD - pronoun+verb pairing); 'to find out' → 'descubrir' (A-type: single word infinitive); 'what the answer is' → 'cuál es la respuesta' (M-type: embedded question structure). TILING: ella quiere + descubrir + cuál es la respuesta ✅

seed_pair: Queremos reunirnos a las seis esta noche.
We want to meet at six o'clock this evening.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'we want' → 'queremos' (A-type: single conjugated verb that implies 'we'); 'to meet' → 'reunirnos' (A-type: single reflexive verb); 'at six o'clock' → 'a las seis' (M-type: time expression with preposition); 'this evening' → 'esta noche' (M-type: time phrase). TILING: queremos + reunirnos + a las seis + esta noche ✅

seed_pair: Pero no quiero parar de hablar.
But I don't want to stop talking.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'but' → 'pero' (A-type); 'I don't want' → 'no quiero' (M-type: negation + verb); 'to stop' → 'parar' (A-type); 'talking' → 'de hablar' (M-type: gerund to infinitive pattern with preposition). TILING: pero + no quiero + parar + de hablar ✅

seed_pair: Quieres aprender su nombre rápidamente.
You want to learn his name quickly.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'you want' → 'quieres' (A-type: single conjugated verb implies 'you'); 'to learn' → 'aprender' (A-type); 'his name' → 'su nombre' (M-type: possessive + noun); 'quickly' → 'rápidamente' (A-type). TILING: quieres + aprender + su nombre + rápidamente ✅
